descriptionHTML:
Take delight in this exclusive watch face and express your inner soul.
Now with Impressive Interactive Watch Face functions.

Perfect for round and square devices.
Supports all Android Wear watches, including the latest models!

💡 NOTICE
All Settings are accessible via Android Wear Application on the phone.
Just select Zodiac and click the "gear icon" (FAQ link at the bottom).

⭐ INTERACTIVE FUNCTIONS
Loads of interactive functions!
Check out the following possibilities:

Control:
- Run any app installed on your Watch
- Apply Next Preset
- Music Play/Pause (on phone)
- Music Next (on phone)
- Music Prev (on phone)
- Mute (on phone)
- Control Spotify
- Control Pocket Casts
- Un-mute (on phone)
- Open Settings
- System Apps (Flash, Timer and etc.)

Toggle:
- Mute/un-mute (on phone)
- Phone Flashlight (on phone)
- Voice Recording (on phone)
- Visibility of side numbers on watch face

Run / Show:
- Agenda
- Android Wear Weather
- Motorola BODY (NEW)
- Motorola Steps (OLD)
- Motorola Heart Rate (OLD)
- Motorola Health (OLD)
- Google Translate
- Google Maps
- Google Keep
- Google Music
- Google FIT
- Google Hangouts
- Stopwatch
- Asus Wellness
- Asus UP by Jawbone
- Asus Compass

Cool:
- TellMeTheTime (on phone)

⭐ ENDLESS CUSTOMIZATION:

Presets Functionality
- create configurations for your watch face
- import watch faces created by other users
- save
- share
- Presets community: http://goo.gl/1kIXjB

Fonts options
- for time elements
- for all rings
- for time markers
25 color elements to customize and set e.g.:
- background color
- watch hands color
- the zodiac sign
- time marks
- decoration
- info elements

2 weather forecast providers
- 4 options of weather update frequency
- Celsius and Fahrenheit degrees
- icon option

settings colors for both modes:
- the ambient mode
- the normal mode

12 Zodiac signs to personalize your watch
- option to turn on / off the zodiac sign
- zodiac sign in full color
- outline of the zodiac sign

Countdown option
- count the hours
- count the days

6 watch hands types to choose
Digits on / off option – in normal and dim mode

3 modes of presenting the passing seconds:
- sweeping seconds
- pulsing seconds
- tail mode

Short, normal and translucent notification cards.

4 customizable dials / rings – in normal and dim mode
14 options of dials / rings such as watch & phone battery; digital time option; weather option and much
and more...

The Watch Face - Zodiac works with square and round watches.

Zodiac watchface is designed for Android Wear System 5+

Join beta community and be the first to check and test all new features: https://goo.gl/uDutMr

If you find our watches creative visit our watchface collection on: http://goo.gl/gF3W1f

⭐ COMPATIBLE WITH
Moto 360 ( moto360 )
Moto 360 2015 ( 42mm, 46mm )
Huawei Watch
LG G Watch R ( lgwr )
LG G Watch W100 ( lgwg )
LG Watch Urbane ( lgwu )
Sony Smartwatch 3 ( sw3 )
Samsung Gear Live
Asus ZenWatch ( zenwatch 1 & 2 )

Zodiac is a premium and thoroughly tested application.
In case of any problems, don’t rate it 1-star, instead please contact us on: academyextreme@gmail.com

⭐ PERMISSIONS
Location: weather
Prevent device from sleeping: Watch Face requirement
Full network access: weather
Run at startup: phone battery and weather updates startup
Control vibration: feedback from some of interactive functions
Camera: for phone flashlight control
Microphone: for enabling and disabling voice recording function

⭐ FAQ
http://goo.gl/5b83Sb

If the Application does not appear on your watch:
- uninstall the face
- disconnect watch from phone
- restart watch
- connect watch and phone
- install Zodiac
comments: Extremely user friendly. Seems so simple yet you can actually make quite a few different face looks with it. Your zodiac sign or not you can make a really nice watch face however you want with quite a few choices. Great app, and great developer one of my favorites personally.

This is the best watch face I've found. Easy to customize, nice and responsive, and I love how you can save your settings. I've spent a good hour tinkering and saving presets so I can switch back and forth between my favorite styles. Excellent work designing this!!
Very disappointing Too many display options. Step counter display doesn't work despite keep connecting to Google fit.  Waste of money!!
Nice Work. Can't complain much. Nicely designed watch face. Menu are easy to click and face is very responsive.
I've followed the instructions and factory reset and the zodiac watch is still not connecting Zodiac watch is installed but it not showing up on my watch or android
Just downloaded this as part of a premium membership. Had to pay for it but it doesn't do anything won't open and can't be found. Instead of open it says refund I. App store
